name: Futuridium
description:
Futuridium

is an opensource game inspired to The Binding of Isaac, in fact every floor is randomly generated, so are the monsters and the drops from them.

There are many available items to drop and three main spells: energy orb, energy ball and drive-x

Technology

The game uses the latest .NET library (4.6.1) and is written in C#, using a simple library called aiv-engine (https://github.com/luxkun/aivengine).

Download

You can build yourself the game in Windows, Linux and Mac, the code can be found here:

https://github.com/luxkun/futuridium

There are also precompiled binaries available here on itch.io (just extract the .rar and open Futuridium.exe in the "bin/release" directory).

Thanks for your time random internet user, and remember that any feedback is appreciated!
